          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Frozen milk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefrorene Milch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lait surgelé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leite frozen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Latte frozen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παγωμένο γάλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Leche congelada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that liquid becomes solid under cold temperature. Solid does not flow, unlike liquid and gas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Flüssigkeit unter 
kalter Temperatur fest wird. Körper fließt, nicht anders als 
Flüssigkeit und Gas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le liquide devient 
plein sous la température froide. Le solide ne coule pas, à la
différence du liquide et du gaz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o líquido se torna 
contínuo sob a temperatura fria. O sólido não flui, ao 
contrário do líquido e do gás.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il liquido diventa
solido sotto la temperatura fredda. Il solido non fluisce, 
diverso di liquido e di gas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το υγρό γίνεται 
στερεό κάτω από την κρύα θερμοκρασία. Το στερεό δεν ρέει,
αντίθετα από το υγρό και αέριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el líquido llega a
ser sólido bajo temperatura fría. El sólido no fluye, 
desemejante de líquido y de gas.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">kalt</string>
          </keyword>
